pageTitle: Giro Prolight SLX Shoes 2012 > Sale | Jenson USA
textBeforeTable: Giro Prolight SLX Shoe Sizing Works with road 3 bolt cleats(Look style) Approximate weight 205 grams Ultra-light EPP footbed with X-Static anti-microbial fiber Easton EC90 SLX high-modulus carbon sole Offset "D-rings" made of titanium to reduce pressure points and reduce weight 3 strap closure Teijin AG100 ultra-light microfober upper Giro Prolight SLX Shoe Features The Prolight SLX redefines fit, feel and power-to-weight performance in a lightweight shoe. Starting with a select Teijin microfiber upper that shapes to your foot like a second skin, Giro then added an ultralight EVA footbed plus a SuperNatural Fit Kit footbed with adjustable arch support so you can customize the fit to match your needs. At only 6.5mm thick, the high-modulus Easton® EC90 SLX outsole is exceptionally thin and light yet provides best-in-class stiffness for maximum power transfer. Titanium hardware reduces weight even further. If you’re looking for the lightest pro-level shoe without compromise, this is it.
